flawed_nl_solution:
The first round will result in 1000 * 10% = <<1000*10*0.01=100>>100 employee layoffs.
There are 1000 - 100 = <<1000-100=9000>>9000 employees remaining.
The second round will result in 9000 * 10% = <<9000*10*0.01=900>>900 employee layoffs.
There are 9000 - 900 = <<9000-900=8100>>8100 employees remaining.
The third round will result in 8100 * 10% = <<8100*10*0.01=810>>810 employee layoffs.
The total number of of employees laid off is 100 + 900 + 810 = <<100+900+810=1810>>1810.
#### 1810

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 900, not 9000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
